category: news
title: "AWS provides USD$14-million in cloud services to advance equal access to health care"
excerpt: "Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced that it has provided USD$14-million in cloud services to help advance equal access to health care. AWS says that it is committed to helping the global need for health equity and it sees the potential for cloud computing technologies to make a substantial impact."

  - title: "AWS provides $14M in cloud services to help advance equal access to health care globally"
    excerpt: "In its first year, the AWS Health Equity Initiative distributed $14 million in cloud credits and technical expertise to support health equity innovations globally. The global need for health equity is receiving increased attention as new evidence reinforces the stark contrast in health outcomes from countries with varying levels of resources."
